quest.name: In Flagrante Delicto
journal: The shinobi seems eager to send you on your way.

* This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Ilberd in Gridania.

※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.
You arrive at the Hawthorne Hut to find that Eline Roaille has already departed for the Bramble Patch. Rendezvous with Yugiri ahead of what promises to be the dramatic conclusion of your hunt.
With the Domans' aid, you have apprehended Eline Roaille in the act of meeting her imperial contact. Her guilt is now surely beyond dispute. Speak with Yugiri to hear her thoughts on the mission.
Yugiri promises to attend to the aftermath of your hunt, leaving you free to report your recent adventures to Minfilia, back at the Rising Stones.

Minfilia is shocked to learn of Eline Roaille's arrest and the accusations that have been brought against her. Setting aside her dismay, she informs you that the Scions have made progress in their quest to gain entry into Iceheart's sanctum.
objectives: * This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Ilberd in Gridania.

dialogue.name: SHINOBI00080
dialogue.text: Now that the jamming device is no longer at risk, you may safely return to your hunt. Pray rejoin Lady Yugiri. She awaits you at the Hawthorne Hut.

dialogue.name: SHINOBI00080
dialogue.text: I shall remain here and have a few words with this sorry lot. Nothing serious, I assure you─just a spot of small talk.

dialogue.name: SHINOBI00080
dialogue.text: I shall remain here and have a few words with this sorry lot. Pray rejoin Lady Yugiri at the Hawthorne Hut.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I am given to understand the mission was a success.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: Not a single imperial soldier made it to our position. Thorough work as always, Scion.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: By way of reward, we can now turn our attention to Roaille once more. What news, Lady Yugiri?

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: My people report that she has departed for the Bramble Patch.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: So she means to go ahead with the meeting. Excellent. It is time to close the net around her.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: My countrymen and I shall lie in wait in the shadows. Tread warily, my friends.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Just beyond, Roaille is in conversation with an individual clad in the manner of an adventurer. An imperial intermediary, no doubt.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: This is it! With me!

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: Flame Marshal Eline Roaille! You are under arrest for treason and espionage!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURER00084
dialogue.text: (-Dubious Adventurer-)You were followed, you bloody fool!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURER00084
dialogue.text: (-Dubious Adventurer-)Damnation!

dialogue.name: FLAMEMARSHALROAILLE
dialogue.text: Hmph...

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: You are unarmed, my lady...and scarcely garbed for battle. But if you wish to fight...you are welcome to try.

dialogue.name: FLAMEMARSHALROAILLE
dialogue.text: What is the meaning of this, Captain? Would you arrest me for strolling in the Twelveswood? When last I looked, that was no crime─and neither was conversing with passing strangers.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: You would feign ignorance, then? Very well.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: If you do think of something to say, there will be plenty of time to say it later. Now, come quietly, or I shall make you wish you had.

dialogue.name: FLAMEMARSHALROAILLE
dialogue.text: I will offer you no struggle. After all, I have naught to hide.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Even a warrior of Roaille's renown could not have hoped to escape by force. Despite her claims, her surrender does not bespeak innocence, but an awareness that her position is untenable.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: With the Ivy thus uprooted, it is to be hoped that the tendrils she entwined around the Immortal Flames will gradually wither and die.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Mayhap then the people of Ul'dah will have the Grand Company they deserve. But let us speak of the present. If I may ask, what will you do now, Forename?

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: ...So the Scions seek a way into Iceheart's sanctum.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Then I daresay you are eager to return to the Rising Stones. Pray do not let me keep you.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Fear not─my countrymen and I shall tend to the aftermath. You need not waste your talents here.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: And speaking of talents, you have been training in the art of the shinobi, have you not? The change in your bearing is quite evident─to me, at least. I look forward to seeing you in action. Till next time, my friend.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: And speaking of talents, have you considered training in the art of the shinobi? You have the aptitude for it, I believe, so please give it some thought. Till next time, my friend.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Welcome back, Forename. I understand that Alphinaud had a task for you. May I ask what it was?

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Charges of treason and espionage against Eline Roaille? I can scarce believe it...

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Could there not have been some manner of misunderstanding...?

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: No, it avails us naught to dwell on it. Whatever the truth may be, we must trust to the authorities to uncover it.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Let us speak of another matter. I am pleased to report that we have made progress in our efforts to find a way into Iceheart's sanctum...
